name: OPL(OPENPLAYLINK)
description:
It is a launcher of executables links and folders

Sometimes it is very tedious to be opening several folders to get to the one you want

With OPL it is more beautiful to open it

It's like a woman's earrings

They haven't been used much but they look nice.

It's just a project that I wanted to do a few years ago but I couldn't because of time. I hope that you who are seeing it like it to organize it maybe

a library of games

your favorite websites

your folders that are deep inside other folders

Inspired by the non-profit PLAY STATION PORTABLE (PSP)

Please take a look and if you like it leave me a comment

Soon I hope to update it a little more

A cordial greeting and I hope it works for you

Greetings to me as a programmer!

#

#To switch between folders and link and executable

#Press "U" while you have the mouse over the play square

#To scroll the app bar use the mouse wheel

#SPANISH

Con OPL es mas lindo abrirlo 

Es como los aretes de una mujer 

No tienen mucho uso pero se ven lindos

Es solo un proyecto que quise sacar hace unos a;os pero no pude por el tiempo espero a usted que lo esta viendo le agrade para organizar talvez

una biblioteca de juegos

sus webs favoritas 

sus carpetas que estann muy dentro de otras carpetas

Inspirado en la PLAY STATION PORTABLE (PSP) sin fines de lucro

Por favor dele un vistazo y si le gusta dejeme un comentario 

Proximament espero actualizarlo un poco mas 

Un saludo cordial y espero le sirva

A mi como programador me a servido saludos!

#Para cambiar entre carpetas y link y ejecutable 

#Presione "U" mientras tiene el mouse sobre la casilla de juego 

#Para scrollear la barra de aplicaciones use la rueda del mouse
